bit_field.name: DRIVER_FAULT
bit_field.description: Logic OR of FAULT status registers. Mirrors nFAULT pin.

bit_field.name: BK_FLT
bit_field.description: Buck Fault Bit

bit_field.name: RESERVED
bit_field.description: Reserved

bit_field.name: OCP
bit_field.description: Over Current Protection Status Bit

bit_field.name: RESERVED
bit_field.description: Reserved

bit_field.name: OVP
bit_field.description: Supply Overvoltage Protection Status Bit

bit_field.name: RESERVED
bit_field.description: Reserved

bit_field.name: RESERVED
bit_field.description: Reserved

bit_field.name: OTW
bit_field.description: Overtemperature Warning Status Bit

bit_field.name: OTS
bit_field.description: Overtemperature Shutdown Status Bit

bit_field.name: OCP_HC
bit_field.description: Overcurrent Status on High-side switch of OUTC

bit_field.name: OCP_LC
bit_field.description: Overcurrent Status on Low-side switch of OUTC

bit_field.name: OCP_HB
bit_field.description: Overcurrent Status on High-side switch of OUTB

bit_field.name: OCP_LB
bit_field.description: Overcurrent Status on Low-side switch of OUTB

bit_field.name: OCP_HA
bit_field.description: Overcurrent Status on High-side switch of OUTA

bit_field.name: OCP_LA
bit_field.description: Overcurrent  Status on Low-side switch of OUTA

bit_field.name: RESERVED
bit_field.description: Reserved

bit_field.name: OTP_ERR
bit_field.description: OTP Error

bit_field.name: BUCK_OCP
bit_field.description: Buck Regulator Overcurrent Status Bit

bit_field.name: BUCK_UV
bit_field.description: Buck Regulator Undervoltage Status Bit

bit_field.name: VCP_UV
bit_field.description: Charge Pump Undervoltage Status Bit

bit_field.name: RESERVED
bit_field.description: Reserved

bit_field.name: CONTROLLER_FAULT
bit_field.description: Logic OR of Controller FAULT status registers

bit_field.name: OTW MCE
bit_field.description: Indicates overtemperature MCE

bit_field.name: IPD_FREQ_FAULT
bit_field.description: Indicates IPD frequency fault

bit_field.name: IPD_T1_FAULT
bit_field.description: Indicates IPD T1 fault

bit_field.name: IPD_T2_FAULT
bit_field.description: Indicates IPD T2 fault

bit_field.name: BUS_CURRENT_LIMIT_STATUS
bit_field.description: Indicates status of Bus Current limit

bit_field.name: MPET_IPD_FAULT
bit_field.description: Indicates error during resistance and inductance measurement

bit_field.name: MPET_BEMF_FAULT
bit_field.description: Indicates error during BEMF constant measurement

bit_field.name: ABN_SPEED
bit_field.description: Indicates Abnormal speed motor lock condition

bit_field.name: ABN_BEMF
bit_field.description: Indicates Abnormal BEMF motor lock condition

bit_field.name: NO_MTR
bit_field.description: Indicates No Motor fault

bit_field.name: MTR_LCK
bit_field.description: Indicates when one of the motor lock is triggered

bit_field.name: LOCK_LIMIT
bit_field.description: Indicates Lock Ilimit fault

bit_field.name: HW_LOCK_LIMIT
bit_field.description: Indicates Hardware Lock Ilimit fault

bit_field.name: MTR_UNDER_VOLTAGE
bit_field.description: Indicates Motor Undervoltage fault

bit_field.name: MTR_OVER_VOLTAGE
bit_field.description: Indicates Motor Over voltage fault

bit_field.name: SPEED_LOOP_SATURATION
bit_field.description: Indicates speed loop saturation

bit_field.name: CURRENT_LOOP_SATURATION
bit_field.description: Indicates current loop saturation

bit_field.name: RESERVED
bit_field.description: Reserved

bit_field.name: WATCHDOG_FAULT
bit_field.description: indicates Watchdog fault

bit_field.name: STL_ENABLE_STATUS
bit_field.description: STL Enable Status

bit_field.name: STL_STATUS
bit_field.description: STL Status

bit_field.name: APP_RESET
bit_field.description: App Reset

bit_field.name: VOLT_MAG
bit_field.description: 16-bit value indicating applied Modulation index. Modulation index applied = VOLT_MAG * 100 / 32768 %

bit_field.name: DUTY_CMD
bit_field.description:
12-bit value indicating decoded Duty command in PWM/Analog mode   
DUTY_CMD (%) = DUTY_CMD/4096 * 100%.

bit_field.name: SYS_ENABLE_FLAG
bit_field.description:
1 indicates GUI can control the register
0 indicates GUI is still copying default parameters from shadow memory

bit_field.name: RESERVED
bit_field.description: Reserved

bit_field.name: MOTOR_R
bit_field.description: 8-bit value indicating MPET measured Motor Resistance

bit_field.name: MOTOR_BEMF_CONST
bit_field.description: 8-bit value indicating MPET measured BEMF constant

bit_field.name: MOTOR_L
bit_field.description: 8-bit value indicating MPET measured Motor Inductance

bit_field.name: RESERVED
bit_field.description: Reserved

bit_field.name: MPET_R_STATUS
bit_field.description: Indicates status of Resistance measurement

bit_field.name: MPET_L_STATUS
bit_field.description: Indicates status of Inductance measurement

bit_field.name: MPET_KE_STATUS
bit_field.description: Indicates status of BEMF constant measurement

bit_field.name: MPET_MECH_STATUS
bit_field.description: Indicates status of mechanical parameter measurement

bit_field.name: MPET_PWM_FREQ
bit_field.description:
4-bit value indicating MPET recommended PWM switching
frequency based on electrical time constant

bit_field.name: RESERVED
bit_field.description: Reserved

bit_field.name: EEPROM_WRT
bit_field.description: Write the configuration to EEPROM

bit_field.name: EEPROM_READ
bit_field.description: Read the default configuration from EEPROM

bit_field.name: CLR_FLT
bit_field.description: Clears all faults

bit_field.name: CLR_FLT_RETRY_COUNT
bit_field.description: Clears fault retry count

bit_field.name: EEPROM_WRITE_ACCESS_KEY
bit_field.description: EEPROM write access key for register DEVICE_CONFIG1

bit_field.name: FORCED_ALIGN_ANGLE
bit_field.description:
9-bit value (in degrees) used during forced Align state ( FORCE_ALIGN_EN = 1)  

Angle applied = FORCED_ALIGN_ANGLE % 360deg

bit_field.name: WATCHDOG_TICKLE
bit_field.description: RAM bit to tickle watchdog in I2C mode. This bit should be written 1 by external controller every EXT_WDT_CFG. The MCF will reset this bit

bit_field.name: RESERVED
bit_field.description: Reserved

bit_field.name: OVERRIDE
bit_field.description:
Use to control the SPD_CTRL bits.  
If OVERRIDE = '1', speed command can be written by the user through serial interface.

bit_field.name: DIGITAL_SPEED_CTRL
bit_field.description:
Digital Speed Control   
If OVERRIDE = 0b1, then SPEED_CMD is control using DIGITAL_SPEED_CTRL

bit_field.name: CLOSED_LOOP_DIS
bit_field.description: Use to disable Closed loop

bit_field.name: FORCE_ALIGN_EN
bit_field.description: Force Align State Enable

bit_field.name: FORCE_SLOW_FIRST_CYCLE_EN
bit_field.description: Force Slow First Cycle Enable

bit_field.name: FORCE_IPD_EN
bit_field.description: Force IPD Enable

bit_field.name: FORCE_ISD_EN
bit_field.description: Force ISD enable

bit_field.name: FORCE_ALIGN_ANGLE_SRC_SEL
bit_field.description: Force Align Angle State Source Select

bit_field.name: FORCE_IQ_REF_SPEED_LOOP_DIS
bit_field.description:
Sets IQ Ref (% of BASE_CURRENT) when speed loop is disabled 
   
If SPEED_LOOP_DIS = 0b1, then Iq_ref is control using  IQ_REF_SPEED_LOOP_DIS 

iqRef = 
(FORCE_IQ_REF_SPEED_LOOP_DIS /500) * BASE_CURRENT if FORCE_IQ_REF_SPEED_LOOP_DIS  < 500

(FORCE_IQ_REF_SPEED_LOOP_DIS  - 1024)/500 * BASE_CURRENT if FORCE_IQ_REF_SPEED_LOOP_DIS  > 512
  
Valid values are 0 to 500 and 512 to 1000

bit_field.name: RESERVED
bit_field.description: Reserved

bit_field.name: FORCE_RECIRCULATE_STOP_SECTOR
bit_field.description: use to do the recirculation at specific sector during force motor stop condition

bit_field.name: FORCE_RECIRCULATE_STOP_EN
bit_field.description: Force recirculate stop Enable

bit_field.name: CURRENT_LOOP_DIS
bit_field.description:
Use to control the FORCE_VD_CURRENT_LOOP_DIS and FORCE_VQ_CURRENT_LOOP_DIS.  
If CURRENT_LOOP_DIS = '1', Current loop and speed loop is disabled

bit_field.name: FORCE_VD_CURRENT_LOOP_DIS
bit_field.description:
Sets Vd when current loop speed loop are disabled   
If CURRENT_LOOP_DIS = 0b1, then Vd is control using  FORCE_VD_CURRENT_LOOP_DIS

mdRef = 
(FORCE_VD_CURRENT_LOOP_DIS /500) if FORCE_VD_CURRENT_LOOP_DIS  < 500

(FORCE_VD_CURRENT_LOOP_DIS  - 1024)/500 if FORCE_VD_CURRENT_LOOP_DIS  > 512

Valid values: 0 to 500 and 512 to 1000

bit_field.name: FORCE_VQ_CURRENT_LOOP_DIS
bit_field.description:
Sets Vq when current loop speed loop are disabled   
If CURRENT_LOOP_DIS = 0b1, then Vq is control using  FORCE_VQ_CURRENT_LOOP_DIS

mqRef = 
(FORCE_VQ_CURRENT_LOOP_DIS /500) if FORCE_VQ_CURRENT_LOOP_DIS  < 500

(FORCE_VQ_CURRENT_LOOP_DIS  - 1024)/500 if FORCE_VQ_CURRENT_LOOP_DIS  > 512

Valid values: 0 to 500 and 512 to 1000

bit_field.name: MPET_CMD
bit_field.description: Initiates motor parameter measurement routine when set to 1

bit_field.name: MPET_R
bit_field.description: Enables motor resistance measurement during motor parameter measurement routine

bit_field.name: MPET_L
bit_field.description: Enables motor inductance measurement during motor parameter measurement routine

bit_field.name: MPET_KE
bit_field.description: Enables motor BEMF constant measurement during motor parameter measurement routine

bit_field.name: MPET_MECH
bit_field.description: Enables motor mechanical parameter measurement during motor parameter measurement routine

bit_field.name: MPET_WRITE_SHADOW
bit_field.description: Write measured parameters to shadow register when set to 1

bit_field.name: CURRENT_LOOP_KI
bit_field.description:
10 bit for current loop ki

Same Scaling as CURR_LOOP_KI

bit_field.name: CURRENT_LOOP_KP
bit_field.description:
10 bit for current loop kp

Same Scaling as CURR_LOOP_KP

bit_field.name: SPEED_LOOP_KI
bit_field.description:
10 bit for Speed loop ki

Same Scaling as SPD_LOOP_KI

bit_field.name: SPEED_LOOP_KP
bit_field.description:
10 bit for Speed loop kp

Same Scaling as SPD_LOOP_KP

bit_field.name: RESERVED
bit_field.description: Reserved

bit_field.name: DACOUT1_ENUM_SCALING
bit_field.description:
Multiplication Factor for DACOUT1

Algorithm Variable extracted from the address contained in DACOUT1_VAR_ADDR multiplied with 2^DACOUT1_ENUM_SCALING. 

DACOUT1_ENUM_SCALING comes into effect only if DACOUT1_SCALING is zero

bit_field.name: DACOUT1_SCALING
bit_field.description:
Scaling factor for DACOUT1

Algorithm Variable extracted from the address contained in DACOUT1_VAR_ADDR scaled with DACOUT1_SCALING / 8. Actual voltage depends on DACOUT1_UNIPOLAR. 

If DACOUT1_UNIPOLAR = 1, 0V == 0pu of algorithmVariable * DACOUT1_SCALING / 8, 3V == 1pu of algorithmVariable * DACOUT1_SCALING / 8

If DACOUT1_UNIPOLAR = 0, 0V == -1pu of algorithmVariable * DACOUT1_SCALING / 8, 3V == 1pu of algorithmVariable * DACOUT1_SCALING / 8

bit_field.name: DACOUT1_UNIPOLAR
bit_field.description:
Configures output of DACOUT1

If DACOUT1_UNIPOLAR = 1, 0V == 0pu of algorithmVariable * DACOUT1_SCALING / 16, 3V == 1pu of algorithmVariable * DACOUT1_SCALING / 16

If DACOUT1_UNIPOLAR = 0, 0V == -1pu of algorithmVariable * DACOUT1_SCALING / 16, 3V == 1pu of algorithmVariable * DACOUT1_SCALING / 16

bit_field.name: DACOUT1_VAR_ADDR
bit_field.description: 12-bit address of variable to be monitored

bit_field.name: RESERVED
bit_field.description: Reserved

bit_field.name: DACOUT2_ENUM_SCALING
bit_field.description:
Multiplication Factor for DACOUT2

Algorithm Variable extracted from the address contained in DACOUT2_VAR_ADDR multiplied with 2^DACOUT2_ENUM_SCALING. 

DACOUT2_ENUM_SCALING comes into effect only if DACOUT2_SCALING is zero

bit_field.name: DACOUT2_SCALING
bit_field.description:
Scaling factor for DACOUT2

Algorithm Variable extracted from the address contained in DACOUT2_VAR_ADDR scaled with DACOUT2_SCALING / 8. Actual voltage depends on DACOUT2_UNIPOLAR. 

If DACOUT2_UNIPOLAR = 1, 0V == 0pu of algorithmVariable * DACOUT2_SCALING / 8, 3V == 1pu of algorithmVariable * DACOUT2_SCALING / 8

If DACOUT2_UNIPOLAR = 0, 0V == -1pu of algorithmVariable * DACOUT2_SCALING / 8, 3V == 1pu of algorithmVariable * DACOUT2_SCALING / 8

bit_field.name: DACOUT2_UNIPOLAR
bit_field.description:
Configures output of DACOUT2

If DACOUT2_UNIPOLAR = 1, 0V == 0pu of algorithmVariable * DACOUT2_SCALING / 16, 3V == 1pu of algorithmVariable * DACOUT2_SCALING / 16

If DACOUT2_UNIPOLAR = 0, 0V == -1pu of algorithmVariable * DACOUT2_SCALING / 16, 3V == 1pu of algorithmVariable * DACOUT2_SCALING / 16

bit_field.name: DACOUT2_VAR_ADDR
bit_field.description: 14-bit address of variable to be monitored

bit_field.name: SPEED_REF_CLOSED_LOOP
bit_field.description:
32-bit value indicating reference for speed loop  

Speed Reference in closed loop (Hz) = (SPEED_REF_CLOSED_LOOP/ 2^27) * max_Speed- In Hz

bit_field.name: VM_VOLTAGE
bit_field.description:
32-bit value indicating dc bus voltage  

DC Bus Voltage = VM_VOLTAGE * 60 / 2^27

bit_field.name: VOLTAGE_GAIN_FEEDBACK
bit_field.description: 16-bit value indicating voltage gain

bit_field.name: CSA_GAIN_FEEDBACK
bit_field.description: 16-bit value indicating current sense gain

bit_field.name: PHASE_VOLTAGE_VA
bit_field.description:
32-bit value indicating Phase Voltage Va  during ISD

Phase A voltage = PHASE_VOLTAGE_VA * 60 / (sqrt(3) * 2^27)

bit_field.name: PHASE_VOLTAGE_VB
bit_field.description:
32-bit value indicating Phase Voltage Vb  during ISD

Phase B voltage = PHASE_VOLTAGE_VB * 60 / (sqrt(3) * 2^27)

bit_field.name: PHASE_VOLTAGE_VC
bit_field.description:
32-bit value indicating Phase Voltage Vc  during ISD

Phase C voltage = PHASE_VOLTAGE_VC * 60 / (sqrt(3) * 2^27)

bit_field.name: ID_REF_CLOSED_LOOP
bit_field.description:
32-bit value indicating Id_ref for flux loop  

idRefClosedLoop = (ID_REF_CLOSED_LOOP / 2^27) * Base_Current/8

bit_field.name: IQ_REF_CLOSED_LOOP
bit_field.description:
32-bit value indicating Iq_ref for torque loop  

iqRefClosedLoop = (IQ_REF_CLOSED_LOOP / 2^27) * Base_Current/8

bit_field.name: ID
bit_field.description:
32-bit value indicating estimated Id  

id = (ID / 2^27) * Base_Current/8

bit_field.name: IQ
bit_field.description:
32-bit value indicating estimated Iq  

iq = (IQ / 2^27) * Base_Current/8

bit_field.name: VD
bit_field.description:
32-bit value indicating applied Vd  

vd = (VD / 2^27) * 60 / sqrt(3)

bit_field.name: VQ
bit_field.description:
32-bit value indicating applied Vq  

vq = (VQ / 2^27) * 60 / sqrt(3)

bit_field.name: IALPHA
bit_field.description:
32-bit value indicating calculated IALPHA  

iAlpha = (IALPHA / 2^27) * Base_Current/8

bit_field.name: IBETA
bit_field.description:
32-bit value indicating calculated IBETA  

iBeta = (IBETA / 2^27) * Base_Current/8

bit_field.name: VALPHA
bit_field.description:
32-bit value indicating calculated VALPHA  

vAlpha = (VALPHA / 2^27) * 60 / sqrt(3)

bit_field.name: VBETA
bit_field.description:
32-bit value indicating calculated VBETA  

vBeta = (VBETA / 2^27) * 60 / sqrt(3)

bit_field.name: BUS_CURRENT
bit_field.description:
32-bit value indicating bus current  

iBus = (BUS_CURRENT / 2^27) * Base_Current/8

bit_field.name: IPD_STATE
bit_field.description: 16-bit value indicating current IPD state

bit_field.name: ISD_STATE
bit_field.description: 16-bit value indicating current ISD state

bit_field.name: ALGORITHM_STATE
bit_field.description: 16-bit value indicating current state of device

bit_field.name: PHASE_CURRENT_A
bit_field.description:
32-bit value indicating measured current on Phase A  

iA = (PHASE_CURRENT_A / 2^27) * Base_Current/8

bit_field.name: PHASE_CURRENT_B
bit_field.description:
32-bit value indicating measured current on Phase B 

iB = (PHASE_CURRENT_B / 2^27) * Base_Current/8

bit_field.name: PHASE_CURRENT_C
bit_field.description:
32-bit value indicating measured current on Phase C  

iC = (PHASE_CURRENT_C / 2^27) * Base_Current/8

bit_field.name: IPD_ANGLE
bit_field.description:
32-bit value indicating measured IPD angle  

ipdAngle = (IPD_ANGLE / 2^27)  * 360 (Degree)

bit_field.name: ISD_SPEED
bit_field.description:
32-bit value indicating calculated speed during ISD state  

isdSpeed = (ISD_SPEED / 2^27) * max_Speed- In Hz

bit_field.name: SPEED_REF_OPEN_LOOP
bit_field.description:
32-bit value indicating Open Loop Speed

openLoopSpeedRef = (SPEED_REF_OPEN_LOOP / 2^27) * max_Speed- In Hz

bit_field.name: IQ_REF_OPEN_LOOP
bit_field.description:
32-bit value indicating Open Loop Current Reference

iqRefOpenLoop = (IQ_REF_OPEN_LOOP / 2^27) * Base_Current/8

bit_field.name: IQ_REF_ROTOR_ALIGN
bit_field.description:
32-bit value indicating Align Current Reference

iqRefRotorAlign = (IQ_REF_ROTOR_ALIGN / 2^27) * Base_Current/8

bit_field.name: ED
bit_field.description:
32-bit value indicating estimated ED  

Ed = (ED / 2^27) * 60 / sqrt(3)

bit_field.name: EQ
bit_field.description:
32-bit value indicating estimated EQ  

Eq = (EQ / 2^27) * 60 / sqrt(3)

bit_field.name: THETA_EST
bit_field.description:
32-bit value indicating estimated rotor angle  

estimatedAngle = (THETA_EST / 2^27)*360 (Degree)

bit_field.name: SPEED_FDBK
bit_field.description:
32-bit value indicating estimated rotor speed  

estimatedSpeed = (SPEED_FDBK / 2^27)*MAXIMUM_SPEED_HZ

bit_field.name: SIN_COMMUTATION_ANGLE
bit_field.description:
32-bit value indicating sine of commutation Angle 

sinCommutationAngle = (SIN_COMMUTATION_ANGLE / 2^27)

bit_field.name: COS_COMMUTATION_ANGLE
bit_field.description:
32-bit value indicating cosine of commutation Angle  

cosCommutationAngle = (COS_COMMUTATION_ANGLE / 2^27)

bit_field.name: FG_SPEED_FDBK
bit_field.description:
32-bit value indicating estimated rotor speed  

estimatedSpeed = (FG_SPEED_FDBK / 2^27)*MAXIMUM_SPEED_HZ
